[quest]Swelegfyr Blast Furnace[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aBlast Furnace§r

Temperature gradually increases in §9Passive Mode§r

Additional furnace heat will reset upon recipe change

Power consumption decreases by §c10%§r per §b1800K§r above recipe temperature threshold

Enery Hatch Tier is §arestricted§r by Glass Tier

§6 --- Details --- §r

§5Heat Upper Limit§r:

Normal Mode: §bCoil Heat§r
Passive Mode: §bCoil Heat§r ^ §c1.08§r

§5Blazing Pyrotheum Consumption§r:

Normal Mode: §c1000§r L/s
Passive Mode: §bCurrent Heat§r / §c5§r L/s
Rapid Heating Mode: (§bCurrent Heat§r * §bMax Heat§r) / §bVoltage Tier§r ^ §c3§r L/s

§5Heat Capacity Change§r:

Passive Mode: §c5§r K/s [§aIncreasing§r]
Rapid Heating Mode: §c100§r K/s [§aIncreasing§r]
Normal Mode (Minimum: Coil Heat): §bCurrent Heat§r * §c10%§r K/s [§9Decreasing§r]
Shutdown in Non-Retention Mode (Minimum: Coil Heat): §bCurrent Heat§r * §c20%§r K/s [§9Decreasing§r]

[note]You do not need to use a §aPyrotheum Heating Vent§r on this multi[/note]
